overview: Stressed Out? Need a break? Well Serenity's got the right idea. Sneak a peak at where Hollywood's elite to escape the daily grind. How about a sensual all over body massage? The masseuse knows just where to rub, and she can always tell if your feeling stiff. Maybe an all girl lick feast in the Jacuzzi? Or, if you prefer something more physical...Maybe a standing sex match on the tennis courts! It's all happening at The Hollywood Spa.
tagline: It's time to get your rocks hot!
title: Hollywood Spa
